data.actual_result: You see people that you haven't accepted as friend, and even people you've blocked
data.expected_result: You should see only people you have accepted as friend
data.short_description: In the Online Friends tab, you can see incoming friend requests that you haven't accepted yet, as well as users you have blocked, if and only if they are either IDLE or DND
data.steps_to_repro: - Have some people send you a friend request so they appear in the Pending tab with mention "Incoming Friend Request". MAKE SURE THEY ARE EITHER IDLE OR DND, won't work if they are Online. - Alternative Method : find any user that is IDLE or DND and block him - Go to Online Friends tab and scroll through list
